moreWillComeSoon: More tutorials will come in the future!
navigationInfo:
To move forward in the tutorial, simply press {{nextKeys}}. You can go back to the previous panel by pressing {{previousKeys}}.

You can leave the tutorial at any time by pressing {{quitKeys}}.
tutorialEnding:
This tutorial and others are available at any time from the main menu and the pause menu.

Press {{keyQuit}} to leave the tutorial.
